entry.title: Create the Structure
entry.description: If you can't, or prefer not to use a Maven Archetype, the following steps will guide you through the creation of a new application from scratch.

entry.name: Import-Dependencies
entry.title: Import the Dependencies
entry.description: In order to use GWTP, you need to import the source code. This can either be done with a dependency management tool (Maven, Gradle, etc.) or manually.

entry.name: Create-Files
entry.title: Create the Files
entry.description: GWTP tries to reduce the amount of boilerplate required to create new projects. Still, you need to specify your configuration properties at some point.
